Software Engineer

Full-stack web developer with a passion for learning new skills and solving challenging problems.

About

Recently graduated Hackbright Academy, an esteemed all-womens' software engineering program for full-stack web development. Before Hackbright, I was an experienced search marketer managing multi-million dollar a month budgets and making strategic marketing decisions for Macy's.com. My love for technology and solving difficult logic problems has brought me back to an interest in a career in engineering. Actively searching for opportunities in a full stack or back end developer role.

Projects


Night Out

A web application that allows a user to plan a night around a pre-planned event by combining the event with nearby restaurant or bar options using the Yelp API and sends an email itinerary to friends with SendGrid API.

Github Code Deployed Page

FeedBackBack

Full stack Javascript web application that allows users to login with Google OAuth, buy credits for email surveys using the Stripe API and send email surveys out using the SendGrid API.
